## ObserverInterface type

The Observer interface declares the update method, used by subjects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type ObserverInterface<T> = (subject: ObservableInterface<T>, value: T) => void;
```
**References:** [ObservableInterface](./core.observableinterface.md)
